title: I Just Created 10 Spectacular Winter Outfits From Nordstrom's Black Friday Sale for Under $450
description: I've done the hard work for you.
text: There's nothing like the thrill of putting together a great outfit. Whether it's effortlessly layering the perfect pieces, playing with volume and lengths, or merging two colors in fashion harmony, the way we style our staples and statement pieces can make a world of difference to our ensembles. With winter finally upon us, today, I wanted to offer up a handful of chic and trend-forward outfit ideas made up of pieces from Nordstrom's Black Friday Sale taking place right now. (Yes, lucky for us, the retailer has launched its sale early!)Below you'll find plenty of looks made up of cozy, elevated, and versatile pieces that will see you through the winter season in style. The best part? I've tried to keep all the outfits around the $400 mark (because I know hthe oliday season is expensive!). Keep scrolling to get inspired.Look 1: $227(Image credit: Nordstrom)Lean into the burgundy color trendy this season with a monochromatic look by pairing a silky midi skirt with a soft cashmere sweater. A pretty tennis necklace will finish the look perfectly.Shop the look: Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater Donatello Gian Round Cut Tennis Necklace River Island Easy Bias Cut Satin Maxi Skirt Steve Madden Peony Slingback Pointed Toe Pump Look 2: $432(Image credit: Nordstrom)Nothing looks more elevated than a chic black-and-white winter look. A trend-forward scarf coat and polished minimalist accessories exude a timeless yet current look.Shop the look: RUE SOPHIE Jardin Wool Blend Jacket With Scarf MANGO Faux Leather Bowling Bag Madewell Tapered Denim Trousers Nordstrom Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie Look 3: $205(Image credit: Nordstrom)Amp up basic black jeans and a soft cashmere turtleneck with trend-forward leopard-print kitten heels. So chic for day or night.Shop the look: Nordstrom Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater AIRE Crater 54mm Rectangular Sunglasses PacSun '90s Straight Leg Boyfriend Jeans Nordstrom Kiplyn Kitten Heel Pump Look 4: $357(Image credit: Nordstrom)For an Upper East Side look, opt for a tweed jacket with polished wide-leg jeans and rich-looking flats. The perfect polished look for meetings to meet-ups.Shop the look: Anne Klein Button Tweed Jacket Argento Vivo Sterling Silver Bold Hoop Earrings PAIGE Sasha Seamed Pocket High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Steve Madden Peony Slingback Pointed Toe Pump Look 5: $251(Image credit: Nordstrom)Upgrade your sweatpants with a comfy, wide-leg silhouette in a burgundy hue and style with a relaxed navy sweater. Casual sneakers and a canvas tote will complete your comfortable off-duty look.Shop the look: Nordstrom V-Neck Cashmere Sweater Sporty & Rich 94 Racquet Club Cotton Tote BP. Wide Leg Fleece Pants Look 6: $364(Image credit: Nordstrom)For a chic winter evening look or holiday drinks, a faux-fur trim coat is a gorgeous choice. Style with a black midi skirt, knee-high boots and bold jewelry.Shop the look: Via Spiga Belted Faux Fur Trim Coat Argento Vivo Sterling Silver Leather Teardrop Necklace Bobeau Rib Sweater Midi Skirt Sam Edelman Molly Knee High Boot Look 7: $336(Image credit: Nordstrom)You can't go wrong with charcoal-gray hues and timeless black. It's expensive-looking and elegant.Shop the look: Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater Sam Edelman Single Breasted Wool Blend Reefer Coat Nordstrom Cashmere Gloves Look 8: $296(Image credit: Nordstrom)Winter walks never looked so comfy and chic. A quilted coat, cashmere sweater, and comfy sneakers are must-haves to scoop up during the Black Friday sale.Shop the look: Sam Edelman Reversible Quilted Jacket Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater Levi'sÂ® Ribcage High Waist Ankle Straight Leg Jeans Salomon Gender Inclusive Xt-6 Expanse Sneaker Look 9: $307(Image credit: Nordstrom)Casual-chic vibes. A cashmere turtleneck, wide-leg jeans, and some chic boots are a failsafe outfit formula no one can deny.Shop the look: Nordstrom Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater Monica Vinader Tapered Huggie Hoop Earrings Calvin Klein Vivera Bootie Look 10: $401(Image credit: Nordstrom)Olive green is trending, and there's something fresh about pairing it with pristine ivory textures and tones.Shop the look: Sam Edelman Double Breasted Coat Treasure & Bond Merino Wool & Cotton Cable Sweater RUE SOPHIE Jeriel High Waist Straight Leg Pants Kenneth Cole Meryl Pointed Toe Boot
html:
There's nothing like the thrill of putting together a great outfit. Whether it's effortlessly layering the perfect pieces, playing with volume and lengths, or merging two colors in fashion harmony, the way we style our staples and statement pieces can make a world of difference to our ensembles. With winter finally upon us, today, I wanted to offer up a handful of chic and trend-forward outfit ideas made up of pieces from Nordstrom's Black Friday Sale taking place right now. (Yes, lucky for us, the retailer has launched its sale early!)

Below you'll find plenty of looks made up of cozy, elevated, and versatile pieces that will see you through the winter season in style. The best part? I've tried to keep all the outfits around the $400 mark (because I know hthe oliday season is expensive!). Keep scrolling to get inspired.

Look 1: $227

Lean into the burgundy color trendy this season with a monochromatic look by pairing a silky midi skirt with a soft cashmere sweater. A pretty tennis necklace will finish the look perfectly.

Shop the look:

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

Donatello Gian

Round Cut Tennis Necklace

River Island

Easy Bias Cut Satin Maxi Skirt

Steve Madden

Peony Slingback Pointed Toe Pump

Look 2: $432

Nothing looks more elevated than a chic black-and-white winter look. A trend-forward scarf coat and polished minimalist accessories exude a timeless yet current look.

Shop the look:

RUE SOPHIE

Jardin Wool Blend Jacket With Scarf

MANGO

Faux Leather Bowling Bag

Madewell

Tapered Denim Trousers

Nordstrom

Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie

Look 3: $205

Amp up basic black jeans and a soft cashmere turtleneck with trend-forward leopard-print kitten heels. So chic for day or night.

Shop the look:

Nordstrom

Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater

AIRE

Crater 54mm Rectangular Sunglasses

PacSun

'90s Straight Leg Boyfriend Jeans

Nordstrom

Kiplyn Kitten Heel Pump

Look 4: $357

For an Upper East Side look, opt for a tweed jacket with polished wide-leg jeans and rich-looking flats. The perfect polished look for meetings to meet-ups.

Shop the look:

Anne Klein

Button Tweed Jacket

Argento Vivo Sterling Silver

Bold Hoop Earrings

PAIGE

Sasha Seamed Pocket High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Steve Madden

Peony Slingback Pointed Toe Pump

Look 5: $251

Upgrade your sweatpants with a comfy, wide-leg silhouette in a burgundy hue and style with a relaxed navy sweater. Casual sneakers and a canvas tote will complete your comfortable off-duty look.

Shop the look:

Nordstrom

V-Neck Cashmere Sweater

Sporty & Rich

94 Racquet Club Cotton Tote

BP.

Wide Leg Fleece Pants

Look 6: $364

For a chic winter evening look or holiday drinks, a faux-fur trim coat is a gorgeous choice. Style with a black midi skirt, knee-high boots and bold jewelry.

Shop the look:

Via Spiga

Belted Faux Fur Trim Coat

Argento Vivo Sterling Silver

Leather Teardrop Necklace

Bobeau

Rib Sweater Midi Skirt

Sam Edelman

Molly Knee High Boot

Look 7: $336

You can't go wrong with charcoal-gray hues and timeless black. It's expensive-looking and elegant.

Shop the look:

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

Sam Edelman

Single Breasted Wool Blend Reefer Coat

Nordstrom

Cashmere Gloves

Look 8: $296

Winter walks never looked so comfy and chic. A quilted coat, cashmere sweater, and comfy sneakers are must-haves to scoop up during the Black Friday sale.

Shop the look:

Sam Edelman

Reversible Quilted Jacket

Nordstrom

Look 9: $307

Casual-chic vibes. A cashmere turtleneck, wide-leg jeans, and some chic boots are a failsafe outfit formula no one can deny.

Shop the look:

Nordstrom
